spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin beastmaster's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin beastmaster can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin beastmaster that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Order Attack
entries: The hobgoblin beastmaster commands a friendly beast to attack. The selected creature can expend its reaction to make a single melee attack. For the duration of this turn, the beast is considered to have the Martial Advantage ability.

reaction.name: Beast Loyalty
entries: When a creature the hobgoblin beastmaster can see targets it with an attack, the hobgoblin beastmaster chooses a friendly beast within 5 feet of it. The beast jumps to take the hit, and the two creatures swap places and the chosen beast becomes the target instead.
